article.name: Critters
article.description: Click on the critter, it generates a new random one. Random critter. Based entirely on the work by Jared Tarbel, from levitated.net, because he has such great ideas. I made this a long long time ago, and found it recently for publishing. Random character generation could be useful for providing games with infinite variety of creatures that change every time a user plays.
article.keywords: Flash actionscript critter random generated character game
